      About this item

      • It is suitable for Windows/Mac/Android/iPad/Smart TV.
      • It can work on 2 devices: connecting one through Bluetooth and the other through 2.4 GHz USB receiver.
      • It has a built-in rechargeable battery, with a charging cable.
      • Has 2.4 Ghz wireless transmission to use it up to a distance of 10 m with ultimate accuracy and precision.
      • It has a compact, symmetric and ergonomic design, making it fit for both left and right hands and making it easy to carry.

        How are ratings calculated?
        To calculate the overall star rating and percentage breakdown by star, we don’t use a simple average. Instead, our system considers things like how recent a review is and if the reviewer bought the item on Amazon. It also analyses reviews to verify trustworthiness.

        • Navdeep
          5.0 out of 5 stars Great Value Wireless Mouse with Dual Connectivity!
          Reviewed in India on 11 January 2025
          Verified Purchase
          I recently purchased the Amazon Basics 2.4GHz Wireless + Bluetooth 5.1 Mouse, and it has been a fantastic addition to my setup. It delivers great performance at an affordable price, making it an excellent choice for both work and casual use. Here's why I think this mouse is a winner:

          What I Loved:
          Dual Connectivity Options
          The ability to switch between 2.4GHz wireless and Bluetooth 5.1 is incredibly convenient. I use the wireless dongle with my desktop and Bluetooth with my laptop, and switching between devices is seamless.

          Compact and Ergonomic Design
          The mouse fits comfortably in my hand without feeling too small. Its lightweight design makes it perfect for travel or long hours of use without fatigue.

          Responsive and Smooth Performance
          The cursor movement is precise, and the mouse responds quickly with no noticeable lag. Whether I’m working on spreadsheets, browsing, or light gaming, it performs well across all tasks.

          Long Battery Life
          The battery life has been excellent so far. I’ve used it daily for weeks, and it’s still going strong. The energy-saving features, like the auto-sleep function, are a nice bonus.

          Plug-and-Play Convenience
          Setting it up was a breeze—just plug in the dongle, or pair it via Bluetooth, and you’re good to go. No extra software or drivers needed.

          Affordable Price
          For the features it offers, this mouse is an absolute steal. It’s a great budget-friendly alternative to more expensive brands without sacrificing quality.

          Room for Improvement:
          While the build quality is solid, the plastic finish feels a bit basic. A textured or matte finish would have been a nice touch.
          The Bluetooth pairing process took a couple of tries, but it worked fine once connected.
          Final Thoughts:
          The Amazon Basics 2.4GHz Wireless + Bluetooth 5.1 Mouse offers impressive performance, versatility, and convenience at a very affordable price. It’s perfect for students, professionals, and casual users alike. If you’re looking for a reliable mouse with dual connectivity, this one is an excellent choice.

          Highly recommend it—Amazon Basics strikes again with a quality product! 👍
